dmca.title: Google DMCA Complaint - USBMIS
dmca.body:
U.S. Biomedical Information Systems, Inc.
408 W. University Ave. Suite 301
Gainesville, FL 32601

(352) 371.2647
(352) 376.0587 fax

www.usbmis.com


February 5, 2007 2/5/2007

Pages: Cover + 2

TO:
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
(650) 963-3255 fax


FROM:

Stephen J. Bell
Chief Financial Officer
sbell@usbmis.com (352) 371-2647 x7002


02/05/07

Google, Inc.
Fax: (650) 963-3255

Re: Digital Millennium Copyright Act

To Whom it May Concern,

We are Us Biomedical Information Systems, Inc. Our company produces interactive software for handheld devices, such as the Palm and Pocket PC. During a recent search on google.com, we found several sites linked to that have cracked our software and are distributing it illegally. Below you will find the information required per your posting of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act.

1. The copyrighted works at issue are:
Schwartz Principles of Surgery, PDA edition
The Sanford Guide to Antimicrobial Therapy 2006, PDA edition
The Tarascon Pharmacopoeia, PDA edition
Medical Imaging Consultant, PDA edition
FIRST AID for the Emergency Medicine Clerkship, PDA edition
FIRST AID for the Medicine Clerkship, PDA edition
FIRST AID for the Obstetrics and Gynecology Clerkship, PDA edition
FIRST AID for the Pediatrics Clerkship, PDA edition
FIRST AID for the Psychiatry Clerkship, PDA edition
FIRST AID for the Surgery Clerkship, PDA edition
Obstetrics Gynecology & Infertility, PDA edition
Thompson's Rheumatology, PDA edition
Medical Student Pocket Reference, PDA edition
These can all be found at www.usbmis.com

2. Search Queries, along with the offending links:
